      • TransitionState

        public TransitionState(int id,
               LRKState state1,
               LRKState state2,
               float duration)
                throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        creates the transition state
        Parameters:
        id - see @getID(int id)
        state1 - the original state (transition from)
        state2 - the new state (transition to)
        duration - how long to make the transition last
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - if any graphics error occurs
